entry.em: ..EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THURSDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 108 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 107 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
